name: Navisha Shetty
title: Hello, I'm Navisha Shetty
description: My expertise spans MLOps, DevOps, software engineering, and scalable AI systems. From deploying GPU clusters to automating data pipelines, I love solving complex DevOps challenges. I specialize in building intelligent coding agents with Agentic AI, deploying cloud-native ML infrastructure, and creating end-to-end data solutions.
